CustomField.description:
Indicates the precision of the latitude and longitude values.
Unknown — Coordinates not known. Reasons could include: address is invalid, military address (APO or FPO), lat/lon coordinates not available. Zip5 — Accurate to a 5-digit ZIP Code level (least precise) Zip6 — Accurate to a 6-digit ZIP Code level Zip7 — Accurate to a 7-digit ZIP Code level Zip8 — Accurate to an 8-digit ZIP Code level Zip9 — Accurate to a 9-digit ZIP Code level (most precise but NOT rooftop level)
Note: Concerning addresses for which the ZIP9 precision is not available, the ZIP# precision is interpolated based on neighboring addresses. Thus, ZIP7 is an average of all the lat/long coordinates of nearby ZIP Codes that share those first 7 digits.
CustomField.label: Verified precision
